summary: To obtain a Human Resources Generalist position that will fully utilize my extensive background and in HR, including experience in onboarding, payroll, benefits and compensation, HR policies and training and development

experience.title: HR Coordinator
experience.description: Process bi-weekly benefits deductions for payroll in Fidelity payroll system; respond to employee questions regarding timesheet, leave, and pay. Collaborated with senior management to create fair training and development policy; administered training and educational assistance programs; managed educational reimbursement; provided training to corporate managers. Managed ACA reporting (1095/1094) and compliance. Administered FMLA/ADA programs; PTO donation; worker's compensation program; OSHA surveys; benefits administration; open enrollment; onboarding and new hire orientation; background checks; E-verify; address inquiries; support employees; managed Flexible Spending Account (FSA); maintained benefit enrollments; led Learning Management System (BizLibrary); supported performance management (Halogen); contributed to Del-Tek HRIS testing and implementation; ensured legal and vendor communication.

experience.title: HR/Payroll Coordinator
experience.description: Specialized in payroll-related tasks and wage compliance; maintained and processed weekly payroll, manual checks, and commissions on ADP for three dealership locations; processed employment verification requests; set up new employees and terminations using Applicant One, ADP and Reynolds; updated and verified I-9 forms; assisted with workers' compensation; processed wage garnishments and child support; managed onboarding documents; answered employee questions on policy, payroll, benefits, and wage deductions.

experience.title: Human Resources Communications Executive
experience.description: Organized monthly New Executives Orientation (Onboarding) Program; interviewed employees; prepared speeches and write-ups for internal activities; wrote, edited and prepared 90% of write-ups in the internal newsletter on time; increased the edition of Resort Living newsletter frequency from bi-monthly to monthly; assisted in organizing the company's biggest internal annual event for 13,000 employees.

experience.title: Human Resources Executive Secretary
experience.description: Organized and managed the HR department's events and meetings; created and managed the Senior Vice President of HR and Legal's calendar and meetings; prepared minutes for the department's monthly meetings; assisted in preparing the department's Standard Operating Procedure manual; assisted with HR admin tasks as required; ordered and controlled office supplies.

education.degree: Associate of Arts and Science Degree in Business Administration

certifications: Member of Society for Human Resources Management (SHRM) 04/2015 to Current
Form I-9 and E-Verify by SHRM 02/2016
Certificate of Excellence in the Major of Management 05/2015
Presentation skills training through Knowledge Sharing Sessions, Malaysia 09/2012
Corporate Grooming and Business Etiquette Training, Malaysia 03/2012
